about.title: About me
about.hero: I am passionate about technology with a particular interest in web development, artificial intelligence, data analysis and cloud architecture. I enjoy building useful, scalable and elegant solutions.
about.profileText: I consider myself curious, consistent and eager to learn. I enjoy working on projects where I can combine development, automation, cloud deployments and CI/CD best practices.

areas.webText: Building modern applications with Angular, TypeScript and REST APIs.
areas.aiText: Lightweight models, classification, embeddings and automation with AI.
areas.dataText: Extraction, analysis and visualisation to obtain real value.
areas.cloudText: Cloud deployments, CI/CD, containers and automation with pipelines.

exp.uahDesc: Applied research on emerging technologies, internal tool prototyping, data management and development of small software modules for experimental studies. Collaborative work with research groups.
exp.indraDesc: Development of internal solutions, application maintenance, API integrations, CI/CD pipelines and deployment support. Participation in real projects with clients and complex infrastructures.
